short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to input text through a popup and submit it to ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension introduces an AI-driven Career Guidance Genius to provide comprehensive career counseling and support. Click the button and enter your information to receive assistance with resume building, interview preparation, professional goal-setting, and personalized career guidance. Whether you're exploring career options, crafting an impressive resume, preparing for interviews, or setting meaningful professional goals, the Career Guidance Genius is here to guide you towards success.
